1100111101111111 1010010101111100 1 -> sum: 0111010011111100, cout: 1
0010111010000000 1010000111101111 1 -> sum: 1101000001110000, cout: 0
1011111000100010 1011010010001011 1 -> sum: 0111001010101110, cout: 1
0101111010111001 1010001101111101 1 -> sum: 0000001000110111, cout: 1
0100010100110001 1011110110010101 0 -> sum: 0000001011000110, cout: 1
0101000110010001 1010011000100010 0 -> sum: 1111011110110011, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
1111111111111110 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111110, cout: 1
0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
